message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find incredibly valuable.  I'm asking for $11,000. Given its worth, I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $9,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Bob, I understand your desire for a lower price, but $9,000 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This offer represents a fair compromise.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10,000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
